long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Real-time collaboration and sharing all in one dashboard.

Simplify your work with one board. Whatboard provides one simple view of your business content to decrease cognitive load on your customers, your vendors, your co-workers, and on you! Whatboard's simple drag-n-drop interface and board organization tools make simplifying your life a snap. Whatboard is ideal for reclaiming control over your sales, managing projects, delegation, data rooms & dashboards.

This extension requires a paid subscription to Whatboard. Sign up for a free account at https://whatboard.app and upgrade at any time.
